text.name: info7
text.text: The game focuses on an amnesiac protagonist who awakens in a cave.

text.name: info8
text.text: Through his explorations, he discovers a plot by the Doctor,

text.name: info9
text.text: a megalomaniac who intends to force the inhabitants of the cave

text.name: info10
text.text: to fight for him in his bid to conquer the world. The protagonist is thrust

text.name: info11
text.text: into the position of savior as he endeavors to defeat the Doctor.
